definition: a thin tapered rod used by a conductor to lead an orchestra or choir
details:
noun
- a thin tapered rod used by a conductor to lead an orchestra or choir
= synonyms: baton
- a rod used by a magician or water diviner
- a ceremonial or emblematic staff
= synonyms: verge, scepter, sceptre
- a thin supple twig or rod
= example: a thin supple twig or rod
